attributes.action: Government to be investigated over 100k Covid19 deaths
attributes.additional_details: The government owes it to the country after the lack of indecisive decisions, lockdown happening to late even after scientific evidence was avaliable.  No way should our country have the worst death rate in the world and this has purely been because of the government
attributes.background: Government to allow a full investigation into why decisions were made so late and allow a full investigation to why the government has let the death rate pass 100k

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331877
